page.title: 12A BUILDER
page.content: Mr. Lamb is a builder and builds garages and extensions. Sometimes he builds houses and has even built his own house. He started building in 1968 and before that he was a surveyor. Then he became a policeman. He did not stay in the police force for long because he would have to travel around much more and he did not want to leave Wilford. In his spare time, Mr. Lamb plays bowls. He has won many medals and cups. When his grandson comes up they go fishing. He said the village characters were the two old Wilford families, called the Carters and the Danns. Mr. Lamb thought Wilford was much cleaner than other places he has lived in. Mr. Lamb is a friendly man who loves Wilford.
